entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 30 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
